emberutils.settings.title: EmberUtils Config
emberutils.settings.enchantmentTooltipFi: Fixes tooltip texture on enchantments on MMOItems.
emberutils.settings.mmoItemNameFix.descr: Fixes item name carrying tooltip background in chat or above hotbar.
emberutils.settings.centeredItemNameBack: Center the MMOItems name background on above hotbar. Will override MMOItem name fix.
emberutils.settings.prettierItemName.des: Fixes MMOItems that has previously took out from an anvil which will lose name background.
emberutils.settings.keepChat.description: Keeps chat even if switched server or disconnected. You can still clear chat with F3+D.
